Posts.Content: Hi, this is all new to me, I struggle with the abbreviations!! I'm having surgery on Thursday a mastectomy. I'm dreading waking up with my boob missing. I'm trying to find a way to deal with it, and to be able to face my children (ages 22, 19, 17, 16) without breaking down. Any advice??
Posts.Title: Being scared....

Posts.Content: It's so refreshing to hear amazing support froI'm you alI think I have been screaming inside for what feels like is forever! It's comforting to know that I'm not the only one who doesn't know how to feel, and when I'm asked am I ok, I just say yes I am. Not really knowing what to say. Thank you so much for your advise. I will keep reading this for reassurance . Sending some love back xx
Posts.Title: Being scared....
